hero.title: Park Information
hero.description: Discover all practical information and explore the interactive map of Zombieland.

about.title: About Zombieland
about.description: Welcome to Zombieland, the most terrifying and immersive theme park in Europe! Dive into a post-apocalyptic world where you'll have to survive hordes of zombies while enjoying thrilling attractions, stunning shows and unforgettable immersive experiences.

map.title: Interactive Park Map
map.description: Explore the map to discover all attractions, activities and services available in the park. Use the filters to refine your search!

prices.title: Our Prices
prices.note: * Prices may vary according to periods. Online booking recommended.

coordinates.title: Contact Details
coordinates.customerServiceHours:
Wednesday to Sunday
9:30 AM to 9:00 PM

help.title: Need help?
help.description: Our team is available to answer all your questions regarding:

rer.label: RER
rer.info:
RER B - "Parc Zombieland" Stop
5 min walk

fromCenter.label: From Paris Center
fromCenter.info:
Take the Ring Road towards Porte de la Chapelle
Exit 23 "Zombieland"
Follow the green signs

fromA1.label: From A1 Motorway
fromA1.info:
Exit 7 "Paris Nord - Zombieland"
Head towards city center for 3km
The park will be on your left

parking.label: Parking
parking.info:
3 free parking lots available
2000 spaces
PMR accessible

accessibility.question: Is the park accessible to people with reduced mobility?
accessibility.answer: Yes, all our attractions and services are PMR accessible. Wheelchairs are available free of charge at the entrance upon request.

age.question: Is there a minimum age to visit the park?
age.answer: The park is open to all ages, but some attractions are not recommended for children under 12 due to their intensity. Check the signs at the entrance of each attraction.

food.question: Can I bring my own food?
food.answer: Picnics are allowed in dedicated areas. However, we invite you to discover our themed restaurants for a complete experience.

animals.question: Are animals allowed?
animals.answer: Only guide and assistance dogs are allowed on park premises for safety and hygiene reasons.

weather.question: What happens in case of bad weather?
weather.answer: The park remains open in all weather conditions. In case of extreme weather conditions, some outdoor attractions may be temporarily closed for your safety.

cancellation.question: Can I cancel or modify my booking?
cancellation.answer: Bookings can be modified up to 48 hours before the scheduled date. Cancellations are refunded 100% up to 7 days before, and 50% up to 48 hours before.

lockers.question: Are there lockers to store my belongings?
lockers.answer: Yes, secure lockers are available at the park entrance for €3 per day. Valuables can be deposited free of charge at the main cloakroom.

events.question: Does the park offer special events?
events.answer: Yes! Check our online calendar to discover our Halloween evenings, Christmas events, and special activities throughout the year.

descriptions.defaultActivity: Dive into a fully immersive experience where horror comes to life. Stunning special effects, professional actors and an oppressive atmosphere await you. Screams, smells of decay, chain rattling... everything is designed to create a waking nightmare.
descriptions.defaultRestaurant: Discover unique themed cuisine in a post-apocalyptic atmosphere. Our establishment offers delicious and original dishes to regain your strength between attractions. Fast and friendly service in an immersive setting.
descriptions.sensitiveWarning: Not recommended for sensitive souls and those under {{minAge}} years old.
descriptions.freeAccess: Free access without reservation. Payment on site.

cookies.title: Cookie Management
cookies.whatIsCookieDesc: A cookie is a small text file placed on your device (computer, tablet, smartphone) when visiting a website. It allows storing information related to your browsing.
cookies.essentialCookiesDesc: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be disabled:
cookies.sessionCookies: Session cookies to maintain your connection
cookies.securityCookies: Security cookies to protect your data
cookies.analyticalCookiesDesc: These cookies allow us to analyze website usage (Google Analytics, etc.):
cookies.advertisingCookiesDesc: These cookies allow displaying personalized advertisements based on your interests.
cookies.managePreferencesDesc: You can modify your cookie preferences at any time through your browser settings or by clicking on the "Manage cookies" link at the bottom of the page.
cookies.retentionPeriodDesc: Cookies are kept for a maximum period of 13 months from their placement on your device.

rgpd.title: Privacy Policy (GDPR)
rgpd.dataControllerContent:
The controller of personal data processing is:
ZombieLand SAS
Post-apocalyptic theme park
Email: service-client@zombieland.fr
rgpd.dataCollectedDesc: We only collect data necessary for your ticket reservation:
rgpd.bookingData: Booking data: visit date, number of tickets, ticket type
rgpd.connectionData: Connection data: IP address, browsing cookies
rgpd.processingPurposesDesc: Your data is processed only for:
rgpd.purpose3: Sending your reservation confirmation and electronic tickets
rgpd.purpose4: Communicating important information about your visit (schedules, safety instructions)
rgpd.purpose5: Improving our services and your park experience
rgpd.legalBasisDesc: Processing of your data is based on:
rgpd.basis1: Execution of the ticket reservation contract
rgpd.basis3: Our legitimate interest (park security, service improvement)
rgpd.retention1: Booking data: 10 years (accounting and tax obligations)
rgpd.retention2: Payment data: immediately deleted after transaction
rgpd.rightsDesc: In accordance with GDPR, you have the following rights:
rgpd.right1: Right of access: obtain a copy of your booking data
rgpd.right2: Right to rectification: correct your inaccurate data
rgpd.right3: Right to erasure: delete your data (except legal obligations)
rgpd.right4: Right to restriction: limit processing of your data
rgpd.right5: Right to portability: retrieve your data in a structured format
rgpd.right6: Right to object: object to processing of your data
rgpd.right7: Right to withdraw consent: at any time for cookies
rgpd.rightsContact: To exercise your rights, contact us at:
rgpd.dataSecurityDesc: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data against any unauthorized access, loss or destruction. Your banking data is processed by our secure PCI-DSS certified payment provider and is never stored on our servers.
rgpd.dataSharingDesc: Your personal data is never sold to third parties. It is only shared with:
rgpd.share1: Our secure payment provider (for transaction processing)
rgpd.share2: Our email service (for sending your electronic tickets)
rgpd.share3: Competent authorities in case of legal obligation
rgpd.complaintContent:
You have the right to file a complaint with the CNIL:
Commission Nationale de l'Informatique et des Libertés
3 Place de Fontenoy - TSA 80715
75334 PARIS CEDEX 07
Tel: 01 53 73 22 22

cgu.title: Terms of Use (TOU)
cgu.objectDesc: These Terms of Use (TOU) govern the use of the www.zombieland.fr website, a ticket reservation platform for the post-apocalyptic theme park ZombieLand.
cgu.acceptanceDesc: Use of the site implies full and complete acceptance of these TOU. Ticket reservation also implies acceptance of the park's internal regulations. If you do not accept these conditions, please do not use the site.
cgu.siteAccessDesc: The site is freely accessible to any user with internet access. ZombieLand reserves the right to suspend, modify or interrupt access to the site for maintenance or any other reason, without notice. Access may also be limited in case of exceptional attendance or particular circumstances.
cgu.service1: Consultation of information about the park (attractions, schedules, prices)
cgu.service2: Online reservation and purchase of entrance tickets
cgu.service4: Access to practical information (park map, regulations, safety instructions)
cgu.usage1: Use the site in compliance with the law and these TOU
cgu.usage2: Provide accurate information during your reservations
cgu.usage3: Not disrupt the operation of the site
cgu.usage4: Not use robots or automated systems to reserve tickets
cgu.usage5: Not resell your tickets at a price higher than the official rate
cgu.usage6: Respect the park's internal regulations during your visit
cgu.intellectualPropertyDesc: All site content (texts, images, logos, videos, park concept, attraction scenarios) is protected by intellectual property law. The "ZombieLand" brand and the entire post-apocalyptic universe are the exclusive property of ZombieLand SAS. Any reproduction, representation or use is prohibited without prior written authorization.
cgu.liabilityDesc: ZombieLand cannot be held responsible for:
cgu.liability1: Temporary interruptions or malfunctions of the reservation site
cgu.liability2: Inability to access the site due to technical problems
cgu.liability3: Reservation errors resulting from incorrect information provided by the user
cgu.liability4: Loss or theft of electronic tickets (it is recommended to keep them safe)
cgu.liability5: Content from third-party sites to which we redirect
cgu.liabilityNote: ZombieLand's liability regarding incidents within the park is governed by the internal regulations and T&Cs.
cgu.ticketAvailabilityDesc: Tickets are available within the limits of available places. ZombieLand reserves the right to limit the number of visitors per day for security and comfort reasons. Prices and availability displayed on the site are subject to change without notice.
cgu.modificationDesc: ZombieLand reserves the right to modify these TOU at any time. The new TOU will apply as soon as they are published on the site. It is recommended to consult this page regularly.
cgu.applicableLawDesc: These TOU are subject to French law. Any dispute will be brought before the competent courts.

cgv.title: Terms and Conditions of Sale (T&Cs)
cgv.objectDesc: These Terms and Conditions of Sale (T&Cs) apply to all reservations and purchases of entrance tickets for the ZombieLand theme park made on the www.zombieland.fr website.
cgv.ticketsDesc: ZombieLand offers different types of tickets:
cgv.ticket1: 1-day ticket: park access for one day
cgv.ticket2: 2 consecutive days ticket: park access for two consecutive days
cgv.ticket3: Annual pass: unlimited park access for one year
cgv.ticket4: Group tickets: preferential rates for groups (from 10 people)
cgv.ticket5: Special event tickets: access to night or seasonal events
cgv.pricesDesc: Prices are indicated in euros including VAT. ZombieLand reserves the right to modify its prices at any time, particularly depending on the period (high/low season, holidays, special events). Tickets will be invoiced at the price in effect at the time of order validation.
cgv.bookingDesc: Validation of your reservation implies acceptance of these T&Cs and the park's internal regulations. It constitutes proof of the sales contract.
cgv.process1: Selection of visit date and ticket type
cgv.process4: Entry of personal information (name, first name, email, phone)
cgv.process7: Confirmation and receipt of electronic tickets by email
cgv.paymentSecurity: Payment is fully secured through our PCI-DSS certified provider. ZombieLand does not store any banking data. Payment is due immediately upon reservation.
cgv.eTicketsDesc: After payment confirmation, you will receive by email:
cgv.eTicket2: Your electronic tickets (e-tickets) in PDF format with QR code
cgv.eTicketNote: Tickets can be presented on smartphone or printed. Each ticket has a unique QR code that will be scanned at the park entrance.
cgv.validity1: Dated ticket: only for the date selected during reservation
cgv.validity2: Flexible ticket: during the validity period indicated (if available)
cgv.validity3: Annual pass: for one year from first use
cgv.validityNote: Tickets are not taken back, exchanged or refunded except in exceptional cases provided by law or these T&Cs.
cgv.withdrawalDesc: In accordance with Article L221-28 of the Consumer Code, the 14-day right of withdrawal does not apply to leisure services on a fixed date. Park entrance tickets cannot therefore be subject to withdrawal.
cgv.modificationByClientDesc: You can modify your reservation (date change) according to the following conditions:
cgv.modify1: More than 10 days before: free modification (once only, subject to availability)
cgv.modify2: Less than 10 days before: no modification possible
cgv.cancellationByClientDesc: In case of cancellation by you:
cgv.cancel1: More than 10 days before: full refund (processing fee of 2€ per ticket deducted)
cgv.cancel2: Less than 10 days before: no refund
cgv.parkClosureDesc: In case of exceptional park closure for reasons beyond our control (severe weather, force majeure, administrative decision), ZombieLand undertakes to:
cgv.closure1: Inform you as soon as possible by email and SMS
cgv.closure2: Offer you a postponement of your visit to a later date of your choice
cgv.closure3: Or proceed with full refund of your tickets
cgv.partialClosureDesc: ZombieLand reserves the right to temporarily close certain attractions for maintenance, security reasons or weather conditions. These partial closures do not entitle you to a refund or compensation, unless more than 50% of attractions are closed on the day of your visit.
cgv.accessConditionsDesc: Park access is subject to the following conditions:
cgv.access1: Mandatory presentation of electronic ticket (QR code)
cgv.access3: Age and height restrictions for certain attractions
cgv.access4: Prohibition of bringing food, alcoholic beverages and dangerous objects
cgv.access5: Mandatory mask wearing in certain areas (for post-apocalyptic atmosphere)
cgv.access6: Visitors may be photographed or filmed for promotional purposes
cgv.securityDesc: ZombieLand does everything possible to ensure visitor safety. However, ZombieLand cannot be held responsible for:
cgv.security1: Accidents occurring in case of non-compliance with internal regulations or safety instructions
cgv.security2: Theft, loss or damage to personal items (unsupervised lockers)
cgv.security3: Individual reactions to special effects (loud sounds, strobe lights, smoke)
cgv.security4: Health problems related to extreme attractions (not recommended for pregnant women, people with heart conditions, etc.)
cgv.securityNote: Visitors are invited to consult the safety instructions displayed at the entrance of each attraction.
cgv.ageRestrictionsDesc: ZombieLand park offers post-apocalyptic experiences with zombies and scary scenes. It is not recommended for children under 12 years. Children aged 12 to 16 must be accompanied by an adult. Some attractions are prohibited for those under 16. Access may be refused if the minimum required age is not respected, without refund.
cgv.claimsDesc: For any claim concerning your reservation or visit, contact our customer service:
cgv.claimsContact:
Email: service-client@zombieland.fr
Phone: 06.66.66.66.66
Hours: Wednesday to Sunday from 9am to 6pm
Mail: ZombieLand SAS - Customer Service - 75000 Paris
cgv.claimsResponse: We undertake to respond to any claim within 15 working days.
cgv.mediationContent:
In case of unresolved dispute amicably, you can use a consumer mediator free of charge:
Tourism and Travel Mediator
BP 80 303 - 75 823 Paris Cedex 17
Email: mtv@mtv.travel
Website: www.mtv.travel
cgv.personalDataDesc: Personal data collected during your reservation is processed in accordance with our Privacy Policy (GDPR) available on the site. You have a right of access, rectification and deletion of your data by contacting service-client@zombieland.fr.
cgv.applicableLawDesc: These T&Cs are subject to French law. In case of dispute, and after attempt at amicable resolution, French courts will be the only competent ones.
